The height level thing would look like

heightLevel += 1

For going straight up 1 height level

heightLevel -= 1

For going straight down 1 height level.

item.title: Or?
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

Hey im wondering if theres a OR
in coding?

see i just finished removing all the staircase’s where you click them and end up in teh wall because testrscape stinks like that.
and im gunna re add them my way so they work. of course theres gunna be 50X more coding then what i removed but i find it worth it.
anyway this is why im asking

just like ladders you they take mroe then 2 blocks you can be besie them to use them. a staiircase is 2 blocks wide meaning there is 2 V’s and 2 y’s

and ladders have a possibility of 4-8 X’s and Y’s
so im wanting a code if there is a OR like this:

if(objectID == OBJECTSIDHERE) if (absX == #### && absY == ####) OR if (absX == #### && absY == ####) { teleportToX = x; teleportToY = y; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("Comment."); }

thanks for not helping me one bit at my older thread. all this not heling is teaching me alot about coding. seriously. keep up the no work.
